top_signals.headline: Bank Indonesia Holds BI-Rate at 5.75% to Support Rupiah Stability
top_signals.impact: The central bank maintained its benchmark rate amid global uncertainty, balancing growth support with currency stability. Foreign reserves remain robust at $151.8B, providing FX intervention capacity.

top_signals.headline: JCI Index Resilient Above 7,200 as Foreign Flows Turn Positive
top_signals.impact: Jakarta Composite Index maintains strength driven by banking and consumer sectors. Net foreign buying resumed as EM sentiment improves on Fed pivot expectations. YTD performance +2.3%.

top_signals.headline: Indonesia Q3 GDP Grows 5.12% YoY, Beats Consensus Estimates
top_signals.impact: Economic expansion driven by household consumption (+4.9%) and fixed investment (+5.1%). Manufacturing PMI at 52.3 signals continued expansion. Full-year growth projected at 5.05-5.15%.

top_signals.headline: Federal Reserve Signals Potential December Rate Cut Amid Cooling Inflation
top_signals.impact: FOMC minutes suggest committee members see conditions for further easing. Core PCE trending toward 2.5% target. Markets pricing 65% probability of 25bp cut in December.

top_signals.headline: Indonesian Rupiah Stabilizes at 15,850/USD on Trade Surplus
top_signals.impact: Currency finds support from continued trade surplus ($10.5B Q3) and BI intervention. Carry trade dynamics remain favorable vs USD. Key resistance at 16,000 level.

top_signals.headline: Indonesian Banks Report Strong NIM Expansion in Q3 Results
top_signals.impact: Major banks (BBCA, BBRI, BMRI) posted 12-15% earnings growth with NIMs expanding to 5.2-5.8%. Loan growth accelerated to 11.5% YoY. NPL ratios stable at 2.1-2.4%.

top_signals.headline: S&P 500 Approaches All-Time High on AI Optimism and Rate Cut Bets
top_signals.impact: Index trading near 6,000 level as tech sector leads. Magnificent 7 stocks contribute 60% of YTD gains. Earnings growth re-accelerating to +8% YoY in Q4.

top_signals.headline: US 10-Year Treasury Yield Falls to 4.35% on Dovish Fed Outlook
top_signals.impact: Bond yields decline as markets reprice Fed trajectory. Real yields at +2.0% remain attractive for fixed income allocations. Duration positioning shifts to neutral.

top_signals.headline: China Manufacturing PMI Expands to 51.5, Supporting EM Sentiment
top_signals.impact: Factory activity strengthens on stimulus measures and export recovery. Positive read-through for Asian supply chains and commodity demand. EM currencies rally.

top_signals.headline: Brent Crude Holds at $78/bbl as OPEC+ Maintains Production Discipline
top_signals.impact: Oil prices stabilize on balanced supply-demand outlook. OPEC+ compliance remains high at 95%. Inventory levels normalize. Range-bound trading expected near term.

top_signals.headline: RH, Wayfair shares rise after Trump delays furniture tariffs again
top_signals.impact: Shares of furniture retailers rose in early Friday trading after President Donald Trump delayed an increase in tariffs.

top_signals.headline: Behind the mesh curtain: Why airline class wars will intensify in 2026
top_signals.impact: Airlines are continuing their focus on premium travelers, adding lounges, new first-class cabins and other perks for customers willing to spend more to fly.

top_signals.headline: Buffett, in final interview as CEO, says Berkshire has the best odds of any company for lasting a century
top_signals.impact: Berkshire has "a better chance I think of being here 100 years from now than any company I can think of," Buffett said.

top_signals.headline: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
top_signals.impact: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

top_signals.headline: New Year's resolutions rarely work, neuroscientist says: Here's a smarter way to build new habits
top_signals.impact: To build better habits this year, start by cultivating an "experimental mindset," according to neuroscientist Anne-Laure Le Cunff.

top_signals.headline: Stellantis resurrects $100,000 Ram TRX V-8 pickup truck amid industry deregulation
top_signals.impact: The 2027 Ram 1500 SRT TRX will be available late next year after a roughly three-year hiatus for around $100,000.

top_signals.headline: This investment account is 'like a super-powered Roth,' expert says. And 6 million more Americans are now eligible to contribute
top_signals.impact: ABLE accounts are tax-advantaged investment accounts for Americans with disabilities and other medical conditions. Now even more savers can open one.

top_signals.headline: There are 6 ‘money personalities’—finding out yours can help you be happier and richer in 2026
top_signals.impact: "Recognizing your tendencies empowers you to make intentional shifts and cultivate healthier behaviors," says Steph Wagner, National Director of Women & Wealth at Northern Trust.

top_signals.headline: Minimum wage just went up in 19 states—workers in one state are getting a $2 an hour raise
top_signals.impact: More than 8.3 million workers are expected to benefit from minimum wage hikes in 19 states including Arizona, California, Michigan, New Jersey and New York.

top_signals.headline: Warren Buffett hands over Berkshire Hathaway’s reins to Greg Abel
top_signals.impact: Investors hunt for clues on how the investor’s protégé will shape the $1.1tn conglomerate

top_signals.headline: Crackdown on crypto tax evasion comes into force
top_signals.impact: UK among a first wave of countries to collect digital currency transaction records and share information

top_signals.headline: Sugar set for biggest annual drop since 2017 on surplus outlook
top_signals.impact: Strong production in top exporter Brazil and an output rebound in key grower India is expected to see supplies running well above subdued demand

top_signals.headline: Chip shortages threaten 20% rise in consumer electronics prices
top_signals.impact: Manufacturers and analysts warn AI data centre build-out is crowding out market for semiconductors

top_signals.headline: Eaton's stock sat out the AI boom this year. Here's what can spark a rally in 2026
top_signals.impact: The electrical equipment supplier's results this year have failed to meet Wall Street's lofty expectations.

top_signals.headline: What to expect from the housing market in 2026—and the 10 major cities where prices could fall the most
top_signals.impact: Home prices and mortgage rates will remain elevated in 2026, but slower price growth and more supply in some markets will give buyers more room to negotiate.
